title: StarCraft 2 - MEDIVAC BOOST UPGRADE!? | ICYFAR G2 Showoff

Here’s a chaotic 4v4 completing the challenge in humorous fashion.  Note: there's only 2 ICYFAR games this week!   NEW ICYFAR CHALLENGE:
